Why Traction Exists

August 2025. Laid off from my ML role at a healthcare company.

Applied to 107 jobs. Tracked them in a CSV file. It worked... until October 29.

Got an email: "Hollie Nelson - Interview Request"

Couldn't remember which job. Searched my spreadsheet. Searched LinkedIn. Found it eventually.

Responded too late.

That moment made me build Traction. So you don't lose YOUR Hollie Nelson.

The truth about 2025 job searching:

  • â€¢ You're competing with 130 applicants per job (Google, Meta, etc.)
  • â€¢ Response rates are 5-11% for competitive roles
  • â€¢ 47% of tech workers are job searching (up from 29% last year)
  • â€¢ Layoffs hit 13.8M people (Jan-Aug 2025, highest since 2020)

You can't afford to lose track. Every application matters.
